issue.title: [C++] Add public-api-test module in style of parquet-cpp
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1772](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1772). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should prevent certain undesireable headers and defines leaking into the public API. This arose in ARROW-1771, where `arrow/util/logging.h` crept into our public headers

see

https://github.com/apache/parquet-cpp/blob/master/src/parquet/public-api-test.cc
